description: Description:This adapter connect Slimport or MyDP-enabled smartphones and tablets to HDTV, monitors, and projectors with an HDMI Input.Enjoy multi- screen productivity with the connection of a simple cable.View videos, photos, documents and presentations on a large screen, while emailing, web surfing and texting on your mobile devices.Features:1.Theater-quality HD video, 3D graphics and audio, support 1080P 60HZ,more truly video experience.2.Works with millions of HDMI-enabled displays, projectors, laptops or TVs.3. Charges mobile device during playback using power adapter (not included).4. HDMI 1.4 & Slimport Certified, HDCP 1.3 content protection support.5.No additional power supply requirement,power supply from HDMI device automatic.Specifications:Input Interface: SlimportOutput Interface: HDMIOther: Micro USB (for power charge)HDMI standard: HDMI 1.4Resolution: Full HD and 3D at 1080p@60HzColor: BlackCable length: 15cmNote:Check your device is listed in the Compatibility List before orderCompatible with:1. Google LG Nexus 42. Google LG Nexus 53. Google Nexus 7 (2013 model) NOT 1ST GENERATION4.Asus PadFone Infinity5.Fujitsu Stylistic QH5826. Google LG Optimus G Pro7. LG G28.LG G Pad9.HP Chromebook 11What's include:Slimport to HDMI adapter x 1
title: LinkS Slimport MyDP Micro USB to HDMI HDTV Adapter For Google Nexus 4 5 7 LG optimus G pro Fujitsu Arrows Tab ASUS Padfone infinity
